name: Seth's Escape!
description:
This platformer has a lotta memes. It was made for the YouTuber MVPerry in under two weeks. I had a lot of fun making it! I was trying to design it around a single mechanic like I usually do, but I couldn't really because of all the memes. 

Thanks to Alexei for letting me use a soundtrack in the game! https://twitter.com/alexei_ost

[̲̅$̲̅(̲̅ ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°̲̅)̲̅$̲̅]


AntiqueGearGames.com
